dao

Class PersonDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.PersonDao

  • public class PersonDao
extends java.lang.Object
    The PersonDao class executes SQL statements on the person database table.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.sql.Connection connection
      A connection to the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PersonDao()
      A default constructor with no parameters

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOnePerson(Person person)
      Adds a person to the person table
      void addPersons(java.util.ArrayList<Person> persons)
      Adds multiple persons to the person table
      void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection to the database
      void createTable()
      Creates a person table
      void deleteAll()
      Deletes all the data in the person table
      void deleteForOneUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Deletes all of the data in the person table for a single user (used in the fill API)
      java.util.ArrayList<Person> getAllPeopleForUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Gets all Person objects that belong to the user with the given user name

      Gets the person with the given personID

        Checks that the person is in the person table
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:
